    Stubs #

    Code # 

    int myInteger = 1;
int[] myArray = new int[]{1};
myMethod(myInteger, myArray);
System.out.println(myInteger + " and " + Arrays.toString(myArray));

...

void myMethod(int integer, int[] array) {
  integer += 1;
  array[0] += 1;
}

      boolean myMethod(int x){
    if(x == 0){
      return true
    }
    if (x < 0){
      return false
    }
    return myMethod(x - 3)
  }
